author: wsjcom
title: On ‘White Privilege’ and Inconvenient Truths
text:
Regarding Zachary Wood’s “The Cudgel of ‘White Privilege’” (op-ed, April 9): People like the “Ivy League historian” conversing with Mr. Wood are a menace to academia and society at large. It is not equality they seek. It is privilege they want to assert and maintain. They thrive on racism, which they themselves help perpetrate.
It’s time to stop prattling about “race” altogether. Why don’t we try to live up to what Martin Luther King Jr. preached—that all men are created equal and should not be judged by the color of their...
